item.title: dplyr: basic functions
item.description: Welcome friend :) In this tutorial, I go to introduce you the basic functions in dplyr package: select(), filter(), mutate(), transmute(), group_by() and summarise(). To install it, please use: install.packages("dplyr") library(dplyr) Before I start: as_tibble() Tibble is a modern reimagining of the data.frame. You donâ€™t need to change your data.frame to tibble to use dplyr, but it is strongly recommended. For more information about its properties please check out here
